I love this game <3

Great graphics, immersive world, and stunning sound system! The weapons are great, but the ghostbuster gun is kinda useless, still cool though. I hope the sequel will have more interesting weapons! The marine AI is the best, but I hope the sequel will improve even on this! Replayability is great, because you can always find little system that are fasinating! Like the smell, the flock, houndeye behavoir, Gonarch's behavoir. Xen creatures really felt like they are alive. I hope in the sequel we can see more interesting creatures and more of this little systems!
I hope Valve will never forget, what a great game they made!
